Description:
Model
Brand: ASUS
Model: ASUS TUF Gaming M3 Gen II
Part Number: 90MP0320-BMAA00


Details
Type: Wired
Interface: USB 2.0 (TypeC to TypeA)
Resolution (DPI): 8000 dpi
Hand Orientation: Right Hand
Buttons: 6
Color: Black


OS / System Requirement
Operating System Supported: Windows® 10
Windows® 11


Features
Features: Ultralight, ergonomic design: Weighs just 59 grams, with a shell specially crafted for right-handed gamers
8000 dpi optical sensor: Delivers pixel-precise tracking, with a DPI button to switch between four sensitivity levels on the fly
IP56 dust and water resistance: Protective coating ensures long-lasting durability
ASUS Antibacterial Guard: Inhibits bacterial growth to keep the surface and buttons of the mouse sanitary
Complete control: PTFE mouse feet ensure swift and smooth glides
Customizable settings: Full flexibility with six tactile, programmable buttons and three onboard memory profiles
Easy configuration: Armoury Crate software allows for intuitive configuration and infinite illumination possibilities

Package Contents: 1 x TUF GAMING M3 Gen II Mouse
1 x Quick Start Guide
1 x Warranty Card
